abstract.t: This document specifies a certificate parameter called CERT for theHost Identity Protocol (HIP). The CERT parameter is a container forSimple Public Key Infrastructure (SPKI) and X.509.v3 certificates.It is used for carrying these certificates in HIP control messages.Additionally, this document specifies the representations of HostIdentity Tags in SPKI and X.509.v3 certificates.Requirements LanguageThe key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC2119].
